dcterms:description: Kvasir-SEG is an open-access dataset of gastrointestinal polyp images and corresponding segmentation masks, manually labeled by a physician and then validated by an experienced gastroenterologist.
dcterms:title: Kvasir-SEG

dcterms:description: The Nasopharynx dataset was collected by Dr. Jie Deng in 2021 and approved by the Ethics Committee of the First Hospital of Sun Yat-sen University. Labels were annotated by two specialized endoscopists.
dcterms:title: Nasopharynx

dcterms:description: 2D-CT-Lung is a 2D lung public dataset for medical image segmentation in Kaggle Data Science Bowl 2017.
dcterms:title: 2D-CT-Lung

dcterms:creator: G. Huang
X. Chen

S. Wang
dcterms:description: ESOCT is provided by Sun Yat-sen University Cancer Center and is from 30 esophageal cancer patients. CT scan of the chest is performed for each patient and then a total of 6322 CT slices are collected.
dcterms:title: ESOCT

dcterms:description: BIMR is a privately owned breast dataset obtained by a novel 3D breast imaging device to provide important breast tissue information, labeled by corresponding medical experts.
dcterms:title: BIMR
